definition[0]: a round piece of metal that you use instead of money in some machines
definition[1]: something that represents a feeling, fact, event etc
example[0]: Please accept this gift as a small token of our appreciation.
note[0]: a token of your gratitude/respect/appreciation etc
definition[2]: a token action, change etc is small and not very important, and is usually only done so that someone can pretend that they are dealing with a problem
example[1]: The government thinks it can get away with token gestures on environmental issues.
definition[3]: done as a first sign that an agreement, promise etc will be kept and that more will be done later
example[2]: A small token payment will keep the bank happy.
definition[4]: a piece of paper, card, plastic etc that can be exchanged for goods
example[3]: Collect eight of these tokens and send off for a free recipe book.
definition[5]: done or given only as a small sign of something larger or more important
example[4]: a token cut in interest rates
example[5]: There is a token charge (=a small charge that does not cover the actual cost of something) for the use of the database.
example[6]: The players were amateurs and received only a token payment plus expenses.
